data.title: About: Sunny's Halo
data.meta_description: Sunny's Halo (February 11, 1980 – June 3, 2003) was a Thoroughbred racehorse who won the 1983 Kentucky Derby. In 1986, Sunny's Halo was inducted into the Canadian Horse Racing Hall of Fame.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Sunny's Halo (February 11, 1980 – June 3, 2003) was a Thoroughbred racehorse who won the 1983 Kentucky Derby. In 1986, Sunny's Halo was inducted into the Canadian Horse Racing Hall of Fame. (en)

サニーズヘイロー（Sunny's Halo、1980年2月11日 - 2003年6月3日）は、カナダ生産のサラブレッドの競走馬、種牡馬。1983年のケンタッキーダービーで優勝した。1986年にカナダ競馬殿堂入り。 (ja)

dbp:honours

dbr:Canadian_Horse_Racing_Hall_of_Fame

Sunny's Halo Stakes at Woodbine Racetrack (en)

Sunny's Halo Way in Bullard, Texas (en)

Interred - Kentucky Derby Museum at Churchill Downs (en)
